text: Bus Stop permanently closed
This bus stop has been removed to accommodate a new pavement for pedestrians or cyclists.  Please use stop 4889 from now on – it is about a 3 minutes walk, on the other side of the traffic lights.

Stop 4272 - Glamorgan Drive is closed due to urgent roadworks. Please use Stop 3074 - Oteha Valley Rd instead.
50B Bus Service Temporarily Suspended

Due to bus driver shortages, bus route 50B has been suspended until further notice. 
However, due to a technical error this service is still showing in Journey Planner as cancelled trips.
We hope to reinstate this service as soon as possible, and will notify customers when we have a confirmed date.

Route 74 detouring

Due to heavy congestion around the Queens Road/Tripoli Road roundabouts in Panmure is causing significant delays to bus route 74. This is mainly caused by the roadworks on Church Crescent which will be in-place until late Sunday 25 June, so delays are expected to reoccur.
Route 74 will be detouring around the area from now until the roadworks are done, missing the following stops:
Stop 7527 - Panmure Town Centre: Use Stop 7525 - Jellicoe Road.
Stop 7530 - Panmure Town Centre: Use Stop 7528 - Jellicoe Road.
Stop 7537 - Caen Road: Use Stop 7539 - Johnston Reserve.
